Tamer:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
Tamer:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

Tamer:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
Tamer:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
Tamer:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

Tamer:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
Tamer:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

Tamer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
Tamer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !Tamer:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

Tamer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
Tamer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !Tamer:SecotheDefaultndMagic! poison to an enemy.
